entry.title: WIND WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:05 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
